name: PyNalp
description:
This is an attempt to make a shoot em up game using pygame. Of course it failed. But the main menu is great!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Enter: Shoot

Notes:

There are non-zero chances that the game will crash because blit on a non locked surface. It's rare so try again. If the about menu works, chances are you are safe.

The various paths you can choose are actually useless. You will encounter exactly the same opponents. I didn't have the time.

Anyway, have fun!

By McNiëps (and his brother, Eisloth), with <3

Github: https://github.com/McNieps/PyNalp
